title: Fray Bentos F.C.
text:
Fray Bentos Fútbol Club is a <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> club from <a href="Fray%20Bentos">Fray Bentos</a> in <a href="Uruguay">Uruguay</a>.
Established on September 12, 1905, it is the oldest football club in its city, therefore it is known as "the Doyen" ().
On June 13, 1912, together with the <a href="Liebig%20Football%20Club">Liebig Football Club</a> was established the <a href="Liga%20Departamental%20de%20F%C3%BAtbol%20de%20R%C3%ADo%20Negro">Liga Departamental de Fútbol de Río Negro</a>.
